Class HighScoreManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    A manager to save and load the serialized High Scores.

        public void addHighScore(HighScore highScore)
        Adds a new high score to the list
        Parameters:
        highScore -

      • saveHighScore

        public void saveHighScore()
        Saves the serializable list to the pacman_high_score file inside the high_scores folder.

      • loadHighScore

        public void loadHighScore()
        loads the pacman_high_score file from the high_scores folder. If the folder or the file doesn't exist the method returns and prompts a message of "No high scores saved yet".
